sn_aia_usecase.base_plan:
This agentic workflow specializes in automating OT incident creation and field population.
1. Automatically create OT incidents with required fields: account, asset, and caller. 2. Populate the account, asset, and caller fields when an OT incident is created. 3. Ensure data consistency and accuracy for the specified fields during the workflow execution.
sn_aia_usecase.description: This workflow automates the creation of OT incidents by fulfilling the account, asset, and caller fields. It also ensures these fields are populated when an OT incident is created.
sn_aia_usecase.name: Create OT Incidents
